content:
KeyTipAccessedEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that handles the stem.Windows.Controls.KeyTipService.KeyTipAccessed attached event of a KeyTipService.

In this Article

public delegate void KeyTipAccessedEventHandler(object sender, KeyTipAccessedEventArgs e);
Inheritance
Object
System.Delegate
KeyTipAccessedEventHandler
